title: No-Confidence Motion & Impeachment Motion handed over to Speaker
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The No-Confidence Motion against the Government, and the Impeachment Motion against the President were handed over to Speaker Mahida Yapa Abeywardena on Tuesday (3) by the Samagi Jana Balavegaya.
Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa has said that the handover was a decisive step towards achieving the people’s aspirations.

On Facebook, Premadasa noted that his party, the Samagi Jana Balavegaya works for the aspiration of the people and when the motions are taken up, the people will realize who did not sign the motions and those who support the motions.
China extends 300 Million Yuan to Sri Lanka to procure essentials
